credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Project for a canopy
medium: Pen and ink, brush and gouache water color,and pencil on paper.
description: Two out of eight sides are shown form the inside.  Supported by poles, of which the top of one is shown.  Their capitals are connected by a frieze with a crest border from which lambrequins are suspended.  The left one of the upper triangles shows a girl carrying a flower basket upon a pedestal.  A candelabrum decorates the right one, including swans, a peacock, and other birds, and a putto holding a garland.
name: drawing
